Package smtools.application.registry

Provides a framework for dealing with a global registry in SMTools based applications.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Hive
    The Hive marker interface is used for containers in the global registry.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Registry
    The Registry class provides a mechanism for accessing (persistent) global variables.
    SystemHive
    The SystemHive class provides a concrete implementation of the Hive interface.

Package smtools.application.registry Description

Provides a framework for dealing with a global registry in SMTools based applications.

This package mainly provides classes for managing a global registry that can contain different hives (which, in a broad sense, can be viewed as globally accessible containers for objects).

Refer to Registry for more usage details.
